mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckillId", s.name "seckill.name", s.quantity "seckill.quantity", s.start_time "seckill.startTime", s.end_time "seckill.endTime", s.create_time "seckill.createTime" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
